import designplanningimage from "../images/designplanningimage.jpg"; function ClientServices() { return (

Client Services

Innovation, Collaboration, and Commitment to Excellence, through our Meticulous
          efforts and Critical Thinking we set the bar in Customer Satisfaction

DESIGN & PLANNING

In the planning of your project, it is important to recognize the close relationship between design and construction. These processes can best be viewed as an integrated system. Broadly speaking, design is a process of creating the description of a new facility, usually represented by detailed plans and specifications; construction planning is a process of identifying activities and resources required to make the design a physical reality. Hence, construction is the implementation of a design envisioned by you, the client, as well as architects and engineers. In both design and construction, this collaboration is
essential in creating and delivering a
finished product that meets
expectations.

PRE - CONSTRUCTION

This pre-construction
planning stage involves the
definition of the project,
the identification of potential issues,
planning and scheduling,
the scope, cost estimation,
and analysis of needs for the job.

CONSTRUCTION

Construction is more than just knowing
how to build a quality and sustainable
building. But also developing a solid
relationship with our clients built on trust,
communication, and outstanding quality.

); } export default ClientServices;
